itl.enabler.api

Class GlobalSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • itl.enabler.api.GlobalSettings

  • public class GlobalSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class encapsulates all the system global settings

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GlobalSettings()

      Gets the time that a pump will stay authorised before being automatically cancelled.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GlobalSettings

        public GlobalSettings()

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthoriseTimeout

        public int getAuthoriseTimeout()
        Gets the time that a pump will stay authorised before being automatically cancelled.

        Note :
        If set to 0 then there is no timeout.

      • getFuellingTimeout

        public int getFuellingTimeout()
        Gets the period of time that a fuelling is allowed to be idle.

        Note :
        Number of seconds allowed to be idle. Default is 0.
        The Hose LEFT_OUT event will be fired on this timeout.

        See Also:
        Pump.PumpEventListener.onHoseEvent(itl.enabler.api.events.pump.PumpHoseEventArgs)

      • getMaxStackSize

        public int getMaxStackSize()
        Gets the maximum number of transactions to be stacked at a pump if stacking is allowed.

        Note :
        This setting only applies if the current pump or site mode allows deliveries to be stacked.

      • getMonitorTimeout

        public int getMonitorTimeout()
        Gets the period of time that a completed transaction is available (on the pump) before The Enabler clears and logs it as a monitor delivery.

        Note :
        This setting only applies if the current pump or site mode allows Monitor deliveries.

      • getNotTakenTimeout

        public int getNotTakenTimeout()
        Gets the maximum age in seconds a transaction should be taken and cleared.

        Note :
        This is used by client applications and the pump control to raise an alarm if a transaction has been waiting to be taken for too long.

        Returns:
        the notTakenTimeout

      • getPriceLevels

        public PriceLevelCollection getPriceLevels()
        Gets the Collection of Price levels used in system
        Returns:
        PriceLevelCollection

      • getReserveTimeout

        public int getReserveTimeout()
        Gets the time period that a pump will stay reserved before being automatically cancelled.

        Note :
        If set to 0 then there is no timeout.

      • isAutoModeChange

        public boolean isAutoModeChange()
        Is mode allowed to change automatically
        Returns:
        true if the AutomodeChange setting is set in Site Settings.

        Note :
        If set to true the Enabler will switch the site profile based on a time schedule set by the site manager.
